short_summary: GitLab Premium Subscription Licenses for the Canadian Space Agency
description: Notice of Proposed Procurement: Shared Services Canada requires-GitLab Premium Subscription Licenses for the Canadian Space Agency in Longueuil, Quebec.
full_summary:
# GitLab Premium Subscription Licenses for the Canadian Space Agency
## Solicitation Summary
Bid ID: SSC-24-00026801:T  
Solicitation No.: BPM021612/26801  
Publication Date: June 25, 2024  
Closing Date: July 8, 2024, 2:00 PM EST  
## Request for Proposal

Shared Services Canada (SSC) issues this Request for Proposal (RFP) for GitLab Premium Subscription Licenses for the Canadian Space Agency (CSA) at Longueuil, Quebec.

### Description

SSC seeks to acquire GitLab Premium Subscription Licenses for CSA. The licenses should be in accordance with the attached Request for Quotations document, which outlines the performance, evaluation, and contract award criteria.

### Mandatory Requirements

To respond to this RFP, bidders must:

*   Ensure the submitted bid complies with all requirements of the solicitation document.
*   Provide pricing as outlined in Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing of the attached Request for Quotations document.

### Evaluation and Award

The bids will be evaluated based on the lowest evaluated price. The response bidder offering the lowest priced and compliant bid will be recommended for award of a contract.

### Important Notice to Suppliers

As a result of COVID-19 impacts, suppliers are expected to submit their bids electronically to the contracting authority's email address. However, exceptions may be made in exceptional circumstances. Solicitations received by fax or hard copy will not be accepted for this bid.

### Official Language of Canada

Bidders may submit their documents in either English or French.

#### Financial Support

This project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement. The procurement will not be set aside for Indigenous or minority-owned businesses.

### Contact Information

For further information, contact Agnes Kowalska, by email / anti-spam or by phone on (343) 551-9034.
